name: Arceus Prism Star
author: Masakazu Fukuda
flavor_text: It is told in mythology that this Pokémon was born before the universe even existed.

abilities.name: First Law
abilities.effect: Prevent all effects of your opponent’s attacks, except damage, done to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Trinity Star
attacks.effect: You can use this attack only if you have {G}, {W}, and {L} Pokémon on your Bench. Search your deck for up to 3 basic Energy cards and attach them to your Pokémon in any way you like. Then, shuffle your deck.

rule_box: You can’t have more than 1 Prism Star card with the same name in your deck. If a Prism Star card would go to the discard pile, put it in the Lost Zone instead.
